I remember in previous videos and discussions  it was said that once the MA reaches the BHS  excess MA contributions will overflow to the SA (supercharge SA)  and once the SA reaches the FRS  any excess SA contributions will overflow to the OA (supercharge OA). Is this not the case anymore? In this video you mentioned that any SA contributions above FRS will not overflow but will be retained in the SA  while only the MA contributions will overflow to the OA.
what if my CRMC card is saved in those apps and I pay by card within the app?
Yes can  as long as not paying through Apple Pay.
It has never been "any excess SA contributions will overflow to OA". Only MA contributions above BHS will supercharge SA  then supercharge OA if FRS reached for SA.
I never said that. But if you found  please point me to the specific video
